name: Crash Thunderstud Returns
description:
A game… so epic … it raised the dead !

Intro

Crash Thunderstud, Zombie-Slayer extraordinaire is back for more ! Stranded on top of his beloved muscle car, armed with nothing but manly quotes and a machine gun forged by the gods of war, The Zany Zombie Slayer takes a last stand. No time for sobbing, no time for sorrow… It’s time to kick zombie butt and drink milk, and you’ve just finished your milk !

Circle the zombies to take aim and fire away. How long can you AND your car survive?

Theme

The theme is incorporated on many levels !

  • You literally have to make sure zombies are stuck in a loop to damage them
  • You are stuck in an enclosed area, which is a loop
  • You’re playing a game that is in an endless loop, yes… you are stuck in it !
